Package org.grouplens.lenskit.specs

Support for specifying object configurations in specification files.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SpecHandler<T>
    Base interface for building objects from specifications.
    Specifiable
    Interface allowing an object to produce a specification to recreate itself.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SpecificationContext  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SpecificationException
    Exception thrown when there is a problem configuring an object.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    SpecHandlerInterface
    Annotation indicating the SpecHandler subclass that is used to locate loaders of a particular type.

Package org.grouplens.lenskit.specs Description

Support for specifying object configurations in specification files. This is used to specify things like data sources in a way that is writable and usable across processes.
